Package openDao.operation

Interface DaoOperationFacade

All Known Implementing Classes:
DaoJpaHibernate
public interface DaoOperationFacade
DaoOperationFacade are used to provide information about the operations of database Represents the pattern DAO All classes that need to work with database
Version:
0.1 Create 18-03-2009 Author Alfred Oliver

  • Method Details

    • begin

      void begin()
      Procedure that starts the transaction {Pre: There is an open connection to the database}. {Post: has initiated the transaction}.
      Throws:
      DataException - if there isn't a connection to the database.
      DataException - if there is an error to start the transaction.

    • commit

      void commit()
      Procedure that end the transaction accepting updates. {Pre: There is an open connection to the database}. {Post: End the transaction}.

    • rollback

      void rollback()
      Procedure that end the transaction not accepting updates. {Pre: There is an open connection to the database}. {Post: End the transaction}.

    • finalize

      void finalize()
      Procedure that closed the connection to database. {Pre: there isn't more references to object in memory}. {Post: Closed the connection to database}.

    • isAudit

      void isAudit(boolean pAudit)

    • persistObject

      <T extends Base> void persistObject(T obj)
      Persist object. {Pre: The object no exist}. {Post: The object is persist.

    • updateObject

      <T extends Base> void updateObject(T obj)
      Update object. {Pre: The object exist}. {Post: The object is update.

    • removeObject

      <T extends Base> void removeObject(T obj)
      Update object. {Pre: The object exist}. {Post: The object is removed.

    • deleteObjects

      <T extends Base> void deleteObjects(T obj)

    • findObjectPK

      <T extends Base> T findObjectPK(T obj)
      Update object. {Pre: The object exist}. {Post: The object is found.

    • findObjectDescription

      <T extends Base> T findObjectDescription(T obj)
      Find object by field unique description. {Pre: Field description}. {Post: return object if exist}.

    • findObjects

      <T extends Base> List<T> findObjects(T obj)
      Find objects by some criterion. {Pre: Some criterion, if there aren't some criterion, List all object}. {Post: return List objects if exist}.

    • findObjectPerson

      <T extends Base> List<T> findObjectPerson(String pSentencia)

    • executeSQL

      void executeSQL(String pSentencia)

    • isResultOperation

      boolean isResultOperation()

    • getEntityManager

      jakarta.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()

    • getMessage

      String getMessage()
